pullRequest.title: chore[facade]: use picocli for processing command line options
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR switches PC facade's handling of command-line options to use picocli.
The hope is that it improves input validation, provides better feedback to users, and makes it easier to implement new command-line options.
How to test
test out all the command line options!
Outstanding before merging

 What do we do about Launcher? MovingBlocks/TerasologyLauncher#589
 re-add extended help message with examples
 update https://github.com/MovingBlocks/Terasology/blob/develop/docs/Playing.md
 make sure --homedir --no-crash-report isn't a problem (it was using '--no-crash-report` as the value of homedir!)

filed upstream as remkop/picocli#1197
local workaround in place: fail if homedir starts with -

nodes.bodyText: This is then added via the picocli library, isn't it? I don't think we need to copy word-by-word, but just make sure that users can figure out what options/flags are available.
Does the Callabale move this to a different thread? Will this cause even more issues with porting to LWJGL 3 and MacOS (see #3969 )?

nodes.bodyText:
I changed this from overrideDefaultConfig to simply config because I believed it was overriding the location of the default configuration file, and I thought that a config pointing to a file was clear enough for that.
but now I think this maybe specifies an additional config file that contains overrides. Not something used instead of the default config. If that's true, it should get its "override" name back.
